Class Boss

java.lang.Object
logic.character.Enemy
logic.character.Boss
All Implemented Interfaces:
Blockable, MagicBlockable
public class Boss extends Enemy implements Blockable, MagicBlockable
Represents a Boss-class enemy. The Boss can perform multiple types of actions: normal physical attacks, magical ice attacks, or self-regeneration. The Boss is categorized as EnemyType.BOSS.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a new Boss with the specified health and attack values.

  • Constructor Details

    • Boss

      public Boss(int health, int attack)
      Constructs a new Boss with the specified health and attack values. The Boss is automatically assigned the BOSS enemy type.
      Parameters:
      health - the initial health of the Boss
      attack - the initial attack power of the Boss

  • Method Details

    • attack

      public void attack(Player p)
      Executes one of three randomized actions:
      • normalAttack(Player) — standard physical attack
      • iceBeam(Player) — magical freezing attack with a 50% success chance
      • regen() — restores 50 health
      Specified by:
      attack in class Enemy
      Parameters:
      p - the player targeted by the attack

    • normalAttack

      public void normalAttack(Player player)
      Performs a physical attack against the player. Damage is based on the Boss's attack power and may be reduced by:
      • Player buff (–5)
      • Helmet type 1 (–5)
      • Suit type 1 (–10)
      If the player's health reaches zero, the game ends.
      Parameters:
      player - the player receiving damage

    • iceBeam

      public void iceBeam(Player player)
      Executes a magical ice attack with a 50% chance to inflict the Frozen status. If successful:
      • The player becomes frozen.
      • Damage is applied based on attack value, reduced by the player's buffs.
      • Helmet type 2 reduces ice damage by 5.
      • Suit type 2 reduces ice damage by 10.
      If unsuccessful, defaults to performing a normalAttack(Player).
      Parameters:
      player - the player targeted by the ice attack

    • regen

      public void regen()
      Increase 50 health to the Boss. This action does exceed any maximum
